com.nhn.android.maps.maplib

Class NMapConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nhn.android.maps.maplib.NMapConverter

  • public class NMapConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class to convert coordinates among UTMK, GRS and map tile index.
